name: Shortcut (Lewis_Hill)
description: Shortcut, a game made by team AudioJack.MP3 is an Intense speedrunner game that brings both strategy and reflexes into play. You are in a Giant Keyboard world making your way through a shifting maze making use of power ups that will help you traverse playfield in the best time possible without getting your cursor shifted and squashed into nothingness by the Keys. The theme applies to the RNG shifting of maze keys as the keyboard lives and the power up supplied by the Shift key that rockets you through the maze.
